summary: Full Stack Developer with strong experience in building scalable, real-time applications using FastAPI, Spring Boot, and React. Proficient in microservices architecture, RESTful APIs, and cloud-based deployments (AWS/Linux). Recently worked with cross-functional product teams to develop a 360° feedback platform and a custom analytics tool inspired by PostHog, focusing on performance, scalability, and clean architecture. Adept at using AI/ML tools like OpenAI APIs (ChatGPT), LangChain, and TensorFlow for integrating smart features into applications, such as chatbots, content generation, and recommendation systems. Strong advocate for clean code, agile methodologies, and continuous learning. Passionate about exploring emerging technologies and delivering real-world solutions that make a difference.

education.degree: B.Tech in Cloud Technology and Information Security

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
responsibilities: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop scalable SaaS applications
Built and optimized backend services using FastAPI and Spring Boot WebFlux, following reactive programming and microservices principles
Developed modern UI components in React and TypeScript
Designed a custom analytics platform inspired by PostHog, implementing event tracking, session logging, and real-time dashboards
Contributed to a 360° employee feedback tool, handling backend architecture and API integrations
Integrated Redis caching for performance optimization
Leveraged OpenAI APIs and LangChain to build AI-powered features such as chatbots and content suggestions
Participated in code reviews, automated testing, and DevOps practices using Git, Linux, and CI/CD pipelines

experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
responsibilities: Team leader of the team working on a project to check website performance
Learned about team management and leadership skills

certifications: Designing Relational Databases – Tech Alpha Institute
